author: CBR
description:
What if James Gunn’s DCU did a full Survivor: Heroes vs Villains season with DC heroes and DC villains? Our host, Sierra, pitches a wild DC spinoff reality show where Justice League icons and rogues battle for a million dollars and a jury of their super-powered peers.

What's your wildest pitch? Let us know in the comments!

🎙️ Clip from CBR’s Heroes Journey Podcast – Episode 6.

- Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/A0FY46JMqvs
- More Heroes Journey Podcast episodes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfpipp6KbWs4apsUf5fIcxVw1cpaXXWxg

#DC #Survivor #JamesGunn #DCU #CBR #HeroesJourney #Podcast #Interview #RealityShow
